small_acacia_stump.description: It had its roots here, and it would die here, and so it happened

large_acacia_stump.description: In memoriam of the tree that has fallen here

medium_juniper_stump.description: The remains of an once strong and tall tree.

large_juniper_stump.description: It withstood mother nature for many cycles (and the axe for two hours)

small_oak_stump.description: The remains of a young oak tree.

medium_oak_stump.description: The entlings are not going to be happy with this one

small_pine_stump.description: It could've told many things, now we read it from its rings.

medium_pine_stump.description: It's prime of life was a long time ago.

large_pine_stump.description: To become a mighty tree, so you can end as a stump
